~~~ INPUT ~~~
<html>
   <head>
     <script  >
        function blah(blah) {
            document.writeln ("</script>");
            window.document.writeln ("</scr" + "ipt>");
        }
     </ScRIPT >
     <link stuff>
   </head>
</html>
~~~ TITLE ~~~

~~~ PROPERTIES ~~~

~~~ HEAD ~~~
     <script  >
        function blah(blah) {
            document.writeln ("</script>");
            window.document.writeln ("</scr" + "ipt>");
        }
     </ScRIPT >
     <link stuff>

~~~ BODY ~~~
<html>
   
</html>
